data.trans_hint: Hãy bình tĩnh! Chúng tôi sẽ tìm thấy anh ta.
data.en_hint: Look, calm down! We'll find him.
data.content_game_1: Look, calm down! We'll find him.
data.answer_en_hint: Look, calm down! We'll find him.

data.trans_hint: Những tên đột nhập đã rời đi bằng một chiếc xe bị đánh cắp.
data.en_hint: The burglars drove off in a stolen vehicle.
data.content_game_1: The burglars drove off in a stolen vehicle.
data.answer_en_hint: The burglars drove off in a stolen vehicle.

data.trans_hint: Đừng dừng lại — hãy tiếp tục lái!, Anh ấy nói
data.content_game_1: Don't stop—drive on!, he said
data.answer_en_hint: Don't stop—drive on!, he said

data.trans_hint: Cuộc cải cách sẽ bắt đầu có hiệu lực vào cuối năm nay.
data.en_hint: The reform will kick in later this year.
data.content_game_1: The reform will kick in later this year.
data.answer_en_hint: The reform will kick in later this year.

data.trans_hint: Một tên tài xế ngáo ngơ tự nhiên cắt ngang đầu xe của tôi trên đường cao tốc ngày hôm qua.
data.en_hint: A foolish driver cut in on me on the highway yesterday.
data.content_game_1: A foolish driver cut in on me on the highway yesterday.
data.answer_en_hint: A foolish driver cut in on me on the highway yesterday.

data.trans: Xẹt ngang ai đó (trên đường), phóng ngang qua
data.trans_hint: Một vài tên lái xe vô ý thức xẹt ngang tôi chỗ ngã tư.
data.en_hint: Some reckless bike riders cut me up at the crossroad.
data.content_game_1: Some reckless bike riders cut me up at the crossroad.
data.answer_en_hint: Some reckless bike riders cut me up at the crossroad.

data.trans_hint: Gã đó khiến tôi bực hết cả mình khi cứ đi lò dò phía trước tôi.
data.en_hint: That guy really got on my nerves when he kept inching along the road in front of me.
data.content_game_1: That guy really got on my nerves when he kept inching along the road in front of me.
data.answer_en_hint: That guy really got on my nerves when he kept inching along the road in front of me.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã phải tấp xe vào lề đường khi cảnh sát giao thông chỉ vào tôi.
data.en_hint: I had to pull in to the pavement as the street police officer pointed at me.
data.content_game_1: I had to pull in to the pavement as the street police officer pointed at me.
data.answer_en_hint: I had to pull in to the pavement as the street police officer pointed at me.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã nhanh chóng lái xe ra khỏi bãi đậu trước khi nó quá đông.
data.en_hint: I pulled out of the parking lot very quickly before it became too crowded.
data.content_game_1: I pulled out of the parking lot very quickly before it became too crowded.
data.answer_en_hint: I pulled out of the parking lot very quickly before it became too crowded.

data.trans_hint: May thay anh ta đã thắng phanh kịp lúc để tránh đâm vào đứa bé.
data.en_hint: Luckily, he put on the brakes in time to save himself from hitting that child.
data.content_game_1: Luckily, he put on the brakes in time to save himself from hitting that child.
data.answer_en_hint: Luckily, he put on the brakes in time to save himself from hitting that child.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã suy nghĩ thấu đáo và quyết định đi lối này để đến nơi nhanh hơn.
data.en_hint: I thought straight and decided to go this way for the sake of arriving at the place sooner.
data.content_game_1: I thought straight and decided to go this way for the sake of arriving at the place sooner.
data.answer_en_hint: I thought straight and decided to go this way for the sake of arriving at the place sooner.

data.trans_hint: Bạn không nên để bị kích động khi phải đợi chờ lúc tắc đường.
data.en_hint: You shouldn't work yourself up when waiting in the traffic jam.
data.content_game_1: You shouldn't work yourself up when waiting in the traffic jam.
data.answer_en_hint: You shouldn't work yourself up when waiting in the traffic jam.
